title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Meet Araj in the Lower City of Baldur's Gate Ask her first by saying "Our blood caused that explosion?" Karlach +Astarion + Jaheira + Minsc + Araj Oblodra Lower City - Tell Sally Flymm "So you're to blame for the rise of that charlatan" Avenge the Drowned Requirement/s: Win the Wisdom Check to be able to Probe her mind.
